justification: Acknowledges B’s taste for upside and playoff schedules, but overlooks that Rivera is a Tier 1 cornerstone and B already has a Tier 1 TE, making Chris Torres redundant. While B could use RB depth (only one RB), Liam (Tier 4) is insufficient to justify losing Rivera. The acceptance probability is overly optimistic. Reasoning is thin and doesn’t clearly separate A’s urgency from B’s consolidation incentives as a 7–1 contender.
